sequence:
Mysterious Rabbit Alien?!

<size=45>VI 「The Rabbit Alien Has Arrived?!」</size>

scripts.say: Port area, City Square
According to reports, there will be a meteor shower tonight.
Yep, it must be the Creator who planned for tonight’s meteor shower~
You’re such a show off Hobby~
What will you wish for...
….and so on and so forth, looks like the girls are very interested in meteor showers.
Sure am~
It seems like Bailey is in a happier mood than her usual self.
Hmm? Good mood? Of course~ I am also eagerly waiting for tonight’s meteor shower.
Bailey thinks that, perhaps the Rabbit planet has witnessed all of Bailey’s hard work and will send Bailey a spaceship to get her!
...so that’s what she is actually thinking.
Sadly, no matter how much Bailey hopes for it, I don’t think the Rabbit Planet will send a spaceship out for her…
Spaceship? Nope. Akashi saw from the telescope that it’s just an ordinary meteorite, nyaa!
As for the Rabbit Planet, scientifically speaking, there’s no such planet at the very least in our galaxy, nyaa.
Akashi gave her scientific opinion while passing by.
….ah, although, meow, Akashi did not see very clearly. Perhaps there was a spaceship mixed in all that meteor shower! Nyaa~
Also, for the Rabbit Planet, perhaps it exists in another galaxy far away, nyaa!
Although Akashi is remedying her words, but the atmosphere has become awkward.
Umm…? Isn’t the Rabbit planet something that Benson made up?
